creator: jon@trapdoor.org
text:
See: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_deflate.html

The first example uses AddOutputFilterByType but this is marked as deprecated. It would be nice to see an example which does the same thing (but perhaps this is only possible with mod_filter now?). In any case it is currently easy to miss the deprecation; especially since it seems like such an obvious thing to do.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.
AddOutputFilterByType has been fixed and un-deprecated in trunk
creator: sf@sfritsch.de

text: Closing, as per Stefan's remark. It's not deprecated any more.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
